template.emailText: As requsted, we send your the link to our menu. You can install it as an app to your phone to quickly accesss it anytime:

Customers.title: Customers
Customers.emptyNote: Empty so far. Create a test order from your app.

Orders.title: Orders
Orders.emptyNote: Empty so far. Create a test order from your app.
Orders.dialogConnectTelegramMessage: You will be redirected to our Telegram Bot. Once opened, Click Start to allow it sending you notifications about new orders.
Orders.nameForCustomersNote: Enter the name under which customers see this delivery method at checkout.
Orders.messageForCustomersNote: Conditional message that will be shown after an order is placed with this delivery option.
Orders.paymentNameForCustomersNote: Give a name as your customers will see it
Orders.paymentMessageForCustomersNote: Conditional message that will be shown after an order is placed with this payment method.
Orders.mrSpeedyNote: You need to register at mrspeedy.my and get API key from the MrSpeedy dashboard
Orders.toyyibPayDetailsNote:
1. To register with ToyyibPay follow this link and click Daftar Secarang.

2. After registration you'll be able to find the Secret Key at the bottom of your ToyyibPay Dashboard page.

3. Create a category 'SaveMenu', copy its category code and paste it here.
Orders.stripeDetailsNote:
1. Open your Stripe dashboard and navigate to 'Developers', then 'API keys'. Copy your Publishable key and Secret key and paste it above.

2. Navigate to 'Developers' -> 'Webhooks' and press 'Add endpoint'.
- Into 'Endpoint URL' paste the following:
https://c9m5mpf5bi.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/dev/stripeCallback
- Under 'Events to send' select checkout.session.async_payment_succeeded

3. Publish your app to apply the changes.
Orders.yandexMoneyDetailsNote:
1. Зайдите в кабинет Яндекс Кассы и скопируйте секретный ключ в Интеграция - Ключи API.

2. Ваш ShopId находится в верхней части кабинета, рядом с названием Магазина.

3. Зайдите в Интеграция - HTTP-Уведомления и в 'URL для уведомлений' вставьте
https://c9m5mpf5bi.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/dev/yandexMoneyCallback
Сохраните настройки Кассы.

MenuUpload.title: Menu import
MenuUpload.fromImage: Upload your menu page by page
MenuUpload.fromImageNote: Just make photos of your menu with your phone and upload.
MenuUpload.confirmSubmitImg: Your images are submited for import! </br></br> We will process them as soon as possible and will notify you by WhatsApp or email.
MenuUpload.confirmSubmitDoc: Your file is submited for import! </br></br>TWe will process it as soon as possible and will notify you by email.
MenuUpload.subtitle: You can upload you menu as a file or just make a photo of your Menu pages.

Poster.title: Poster integration
Poster.posterNote:
Integration with Poster allows to automatically sync menu from Poster to SaveMenu and send orders from SaveMenu to Poster.

After the initial connection you menu in SaveMenu will be completely replaced by your menu from Poster.

Sync is only working in one direction: Poster => SaveMenu.
Poster.dialogConnectPosterMessage: You will be redirected to Poster for authorization
Poster.cantDelete: Your menu is synced with Poster. Delete the item in Poster or disable sync in Settings -> Poster

Iiko.title: Iiko integration
Iiko.iikoNote:
Integration with Iiko allows to automatically sync menu from Iiko to SaveMenu and send orders from SaveMenu to Iiko.

After the initial connection you menu in SaveMenu will be completely replaced by your menu from Iiko.

Sync is only working in one direction: Iiko => SaveMenu.
Iiko.dialogConnectIikoMessage: You will be redirected to Iiko for authorization
Iiko.cantDelete: Your menu is synced with Iiko. Delete the item in Iiko or disable sync in Settings -> Iiko
